title: Don't store state in enums.
message:
Don't store state in enums.

This is a weird guess fix.
Crash-log data suggests that sometimes there are two active instances of
the MainActivity (active meaning between onStart and onStop). This could
be some kind of split-screen or multi-app feature (most but not all
crashes come from either Samsung tablets or rooted devices which would
support this theory).
Most of the UI shouldn't care how many instances are running. One
notable exception was the UiControllerMain.State enum whose (global)
instances had local state that would change in time. With this commit
the UiControllerMain.State becomes a regular class so there should be no
problems with multiple instances of the UiControllerMain object.
Whether this indicates a bigger bug that needs fixing or just a feature
of some Android versions that needs to be accepted remains to be seen.

some other directory.

that this is where the downloaded sample files are installed.

title: Prevent crash on double-clicking the start button.
message:
Prevent crash on double-clicking the start button.

Tapping the start button twice quickly executes the OnClickListener
twice which results in calling PlaybackService when it's already playing.
This triggers an assert which crashes the application.
With this fix, the start button is disabled on the first click making it
impossible to start playback twice.

title: Crash fix: correctly disable ff/rew buttons.
message:
Crash fix: correctly disable ff/rew buttons.

Pressing the ff/rew buttons before PlaybackElapsedTimeSyncEvent
is received leads to a crash - the buttons must be disabled.
The earlier code failed to disable them.

title: Fix EventBus-related crash on start on API pre-21.
message:
Fix EventBus-related crash on start on API pre-21.

Overriding a method with ParcelableBundle argument
(i.e. onSaveInstanceStace) causes reflection code inside EventBus to
throw an execption on Android API20 and lower. The reason is that the
ParcelableBundle class has been introduec in API21 and is not available
in earlier versions.

The workaround for this issue is to register an object of an inner class
that doesn't have arguments of unavailable classes.

title: Disable lint errors for Google Services IDs.
message:
Disable lint errors for Google Services IDs.

The Google Play Services plugin generates a resource file with string
resources that don't need to be translated. They are however not marked
as non-translatable which triggers a lint error.
Ignoring these errors works around the issue.

title: Scan all storage devices for the AudioBooks directory.
message:
Scan all storage devices for the AudioBooks directory.

This allows storing books on SD card and internal memory (regardless of
what Android considers the "external" storage).
Books from all sources are combined.
Requires API19+ (falls back to using external storage on older versions).

This change should also fix IllegalStateExceptions thrown by the
FragmentManager's state being changed after its state is saved
(this issue could be fixed by making sure thet showPage() is only called
at specific points in the Activity's lifecycle but now that view state
is no longer saved there's no need to fix this).

title: More descriptive setting labels for kiosk mode.
message: More descriptive setting labels for kiosk mode.

title: Show the current version number in settings.
message: Show the current version number in settings.

title: Add a link to a video demo in README.md
message: Add a link to a video demo in README.md

title: Do nothing if setCurrentBook is called with the current book's ID.
message:
Do nothing if setCurrentBook is called with the current book's ID.

This fixes the problem with the book title being sometimes read twice
when browsing.

title: Call registerScreenOnReceiver early in onStart.
message:
Call registerScreenOnReceiver early in onStart.

It's a work around for the app not always catching the ACTION_SCREEN_ON
broadcast. A better solutions needs to be found.

title: Lock screen orientation and make it configurable.
message: Lock screen orientation and make it configurable.

title: Don't crash when there are no audio books.
message: Don't crash when there are no audio books.

title: Enable proguard minification.
message: Enable proguard minification.

title: Silence lint errors.
message: Silence lint errors.

title: Initialize the ApplicationModule for Dagger.
message: Initialize the ApplicationModule for Dagger.

title: Use Dagger 2 to inject some of the dependencies.
message: Use Dagger 2 to inject some of the dependencies.

title: Pretend the book list ViewPager wraps around.
message: Pretend the book list ViewPager wraps around.

title: Put big "Playback in progress" on the playback screen.
message: Put big "Playback in progress" on the playback screen.

title: Set the correct action page when the MainActivity is started.
message:
Set the correct action page when the MainActivity is started.

Fixes the bug with the green playback screen being visible when waking
the device after playback has been stopped by turning the device screen
down.

title: Detect when audio book files are added or removed.
message: Detect when audio book files are added or removed.

title: Use EventBus for global events.
message: Use EventBus for global events.

title: Move audio book file scanning to a separate class.
message: Move audio book file scanning to a separate class.

title: Allow setting the jump back on resume time.
message: Allow setting the jump back on resume time.

title: Clean up unused imports.
message: Clean up unused imports.

title: Jump back a bit when resuming playback.
message: Jump back a bit when resuming playback.

title: Remove playback start logic away from PlayerHandler.
message:
Remove playback start logic away from PlayerHandler.

All the logic should reside in AudioBookPlayer with PlayerHandler
only controlling the MediaPlayer.

title: Introduce touch-insensitive margins.
message:
Introduce touch-insensitive margins.

This gives the user a larger area by which to hold the device.

title: Say current audio book title only when the screen is turned on.
message: Say current audio book title only when the screen is turned on.

title: Set the MainActivity as the home activity in Single Application Mode.
message:
Set the MainActivity as the home activity in Single Application Mode.

Unfortunately this doesn't always have effect.

title: Start task lock when entering the main activity.
message: Start task lock when entering the main activity.

title: Implement Single Application Mode.
message: Implement Single Application Mode.

title: Add an empty settings activity.
message:
Add an empty settings activity.

The settings screen is hidden to prevent accidentally entering it.
To enter it, the user needs to quickly tap 5 times anywhere on the
screen.

title: Read audio book titles with a softer voice.
message: Read audio book titles with a softer voice.

title: Say the current book name when entering the UI.
message:
Say the current book name when entering the UI.

Other changes:
- the TTS functionality has been encapsulated in a separate class,
- the last message is cached until the TTS engine is initialized.

title: Show a notice when there is no audiobooks.
message: Show a notice when there is no audiobooks.

title: Rename the remaning audiobookplayer to homerplayer.
message: Rename the remaning audiobookplayer to homerplayer.

title: Force landscape mode.
message: Force landscape mode.

title: Create README.md
message: Create README.md

title: Add a license file.
message: Add a license file.

title: Rename the project to HomerPlayer.
message: Rename the project to HomerPlayer.

title: Switch the main view to the book list when playback stops.
message: Switch the main view to the book list when playback stops.

title: Move the MediaPlayer to its own thread.
message: Move the MediaPlayer to its own thread.

title: Add permission to read the external storage.
message: Add permission to read the external storage.

title: Stop playback when the device is laying screen down.
message: Stop playback when the device is laying screen down.

title: Keep TTS enabled for the whole lifetime of the activity.
message:
Keep TTS enabled for the whole lifetime of the activity.

Disabling it in onStop and re-enabling in onStart seems to cause
problems.

title: Fix advancing to the next audio file.
message: Fix advancing to the next audio file.

title: Shutdown TTS on exit even if not yet fully initialized.
message: Shutdown TTS on exit even if not yet fully initialized.

title: Save each audiobook's colour scheme in storage.
message: Save each audiobook's colour scheme in storage.

title: Introduce book colouring.
message:
Introduce book colouring.

The colour information isn't persisted yet.

title: Store page data in an enum to avoid raw position values.
message: Store page data in an enum to avoid raw position values.

title: Keep the service running when unbound.
message: Keep the service running when unbound.

title: Implement persistent storage on top of SharedPreferences.
message: Implement persistent storage on top of SharedPreferences.

title: Initial commit.
message:
Initial commit.

Basic playback works, no state persistency.
